Submitter Information: Thermo Fisher Scientific, Clinical Diagnostics Division
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Thermo Scientific QMS Tacrolimus Immunoassay and Calibrators for quantitation of tacrolimus in whole blood for transplant patient management.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative determination of tacrolimus in human whole blood on automated clinical chemistry analyzers to aid management of kidney, liver, and heart transplant patients receiving tacrolimus therapy; calibrators are for assay calibration.
